Curam Client Infrastructure
API Specification

Packages
curam.omega3.request Contains functionality that allows the processing of requests made to the web client.
curam.omega3.texthelper Contains functionality to allow management of conversion of application data to the text formats displayed on the HTML pages and the parsing of text format data entered by users on HTML form pages back into the required type of application data.
curam.omega3.user Contains functionality that allows the capture of user specific state such as user preferences.
curam.omega3.util  
curam.util.cache This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam Cache service.
curam.util.cache.exception This package contains exceptions raised by the Curam Cache service.
curam.util.client Contains the Client Infrastructure.
curam.util.client.bopi Allows the client infrastructure presentation layer to access a business operation implemented in the application server.
curam.util.client.domain Domain-related processing classes for the client infrastructure, most of which can be overridden to perform custom processing.
curam.util.client.domain.compare Contains functionality that allows the comparison of homogeneous values when sorting and therefore controls the sort order of the data displayed on list pages.
curam.util.client.domain.convert Contains functionality that allows the conversion of data from the application server into the string format displayed on the web page and parses the string format entered by the user to the type required by the application server.
curam.util.client.domain.defaults Provides default values when no other values are available.
curam.util.client.domain.marshal Contains functionality that allows the assembly of data that was split over several form fields by a renderer plug-in into a single value that can be submitted to the application server after parsing by the converter.
curam.util.client.domain.render Contains abstract interfaces for the three types of renderer, namely edit, select and view.
curam.util.client.domain.render.edit Contains an abstract base class for all renderers that are used to render form controls for the editing or creation of data.
curam.util.client.domain.render.select Contains an abstract base class for all renderers that are used to render form controls for the selection of data.
curam.util.client.domain.render.view Contains an abstract base class for all renderers that are used to render form controls for the viewing of data.
curam.util.client.model Contains the view architecture of the client.
curam.util.client.path.util  
curam.util.client.plugin  
curam.util.client.view Contains the View architecture of the Client Infrastructure.
curam.util.common  
curam.util.common.domain Provides support for domain plug-ins that includes simple life-cycle management and supports a shared, thread-local plug-in context.
curam.util.common.message Contains base for utility classes that can handle the insertion of argument values into message strings.
curam.util.common.message.generated  
curam.util.common.path Provides the base for path resolver plug-ins.
curam.util.common.plugin Provides base for all plug-ins including life-cycle management and support for configuration and a shared, thread-local plug-in context.
curam.util.common.util Contains various utility classes to support the plug-in framework.
curam.util.configuration This package contains classes and interfaces for the container independent application configuration.
curam.util.jmx This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam JMX service.
curam.util.jmx.extpoints This package contains classes used in the JMX instrumentation of application extension points.
curam.util.resources This package contains various utility classes.
curam.util.trace This package contains classes and interfaces used in application tracing.
